comment.author: 67507070@N00
comment._content: Eldest of six sisters, she was proclaimed heir presumptive on 10 July 1907, to solve the succession crisis. Thus, when her father died on 25 February 1912, she became the first reigning Grand Duchess of Luxembourg. She was also the first sovereign of Luxembourg since 1296 to have actually been born within the country.

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks to all of you for your good work.  We'll add the date, Aug. 19, 1913 from the negative, to this record next time we update it.
